item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, April 16, 2025 at 8:25 AM UTC
item.description:

11. A flowing WebGL gradient, deconstructed (135 points | 18 comments)

21. Flexport (YC W14) is hiring software engineers ( | hide)
22. Zig's new LinkedList API (it's time to learn fieldParentPtr) (202 points | 153 comments)
23. 100th Anniversary of the Great Gatsby: The Chicago Connection (15 points | 1 comment)
24. Hacking the Postgres wire protocol (198 points | 46 comments)
25. Show HN: Torque – A lightweight meta-assembler for any processor (50 points | 16 comments)
26. The case of the UI thread that hung in a kernel call (122 points | 33 comments)
27. Chroma: Ubisoft's internal tool used to simulate color-blindness (208 points | 60 comments)
28. Whistleblower details how DOGE may have taken sensitive NLRB data (897 points | 419 comments)
29. Fake images that fooled the world (124 points | 54 comments)
30. How dairy robots are changing work for cows and farmers (151 points | 106 comments)
